description: Automate GitHub development from task discovery to PR merge with session-based workflows, batching, and live monitoring. Generate code and answers locally with Ollama and accelerate changes with code-aware RAG. Strengthen results with semantic memory and keep deployments healthy through Render analysis and auto-fix.

capabilities.name: jules_create_session
capabilities.description: Create a new Jules coding session for autonomous development

capabilities.name: jules_get_session
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific session

capabilities.name: jules_send_message
capabilities.description: Send a message to an existing Jules session

capabilities.name: jules_approve_plan
capabilities.description: Approve a session plan to allow execution

capabilities.name: jules_create_from_issue
capabilities.description: Create a Jules session from a GitHub issue with full context

capabilities.name: jules_batch_from_labels
capabilities.description: Create sessions for all GitHub issues with a specific label

capabilities.name: jules_batch_create
capabilities.description: Create multiple Jules sessions in parallel from a task array

capabilities.name: jules_batch_status
capabilities.description: Get status of all sessions in a batch

capabilities.name: jules_batch_approve_all
capabilities.description: Approve all pending plans in a batch

capabilities.name: jules_monitor_all
capabilities.description: Get real-time status of all active sessions with statistics

capabilities.name: jules_session_timeline
capabilities.description: Get detailed activity timeline for a session

capabilities.name: ollama_completion
capabilities.description: Generate text using local Ollama models

capabilities.name: ollama_code_generation
capabilities.description: Generate code using local Qwen2.5-Coder model

capabilities.name: ollama_chat
capabilities.description: Multi-turn chat with local Ollama model

capabilities.name: ollama_rag_index
capabilities.description: Index a directory for RAG-powered codebase queries

capabilities.name: ollama_rag_query
capabilities.description: Query the indexed codebase with context-aware LLM responses

capabilities.name: ollama_rag_status
capabilities.description: Get RAG index status and indexed files

capabilities.name: memory_recall_context
capabilities.description: Recall relevant memories for a task

capabilities.name: memory_related
capabilities.description: Get memories related to a specific memory

capabilities.name: memory_reinforce
capabilities.description: Reinforce a memory when a pattern proves successful

capabilities.name: memory_forget
capabilities.description: Apply decay to old memories or remove them

capabilities.name: memory_maintenance_schedule
capabilities.description: Get memory maintenance schedule for temporal-agent-mcp

capabilities.name: render_connect
capabilities.description: Connect Render integration by storing API key

capabilities.name: render_get_build_logs
capabilities.description: Get build logs for a deploy

capabilities.name: render_analyze_failure
capabilities.description: Analyze a build failure and get fix suggestions

capabilities.name: render_autofix_status
capabilities.description: Get auto-fix status and active operations

capabilities.name: render_set_autofix
capabilities.description: Enable or disable auto-fix for Jules PRs

capabilities.name: render_add_monitored_service
capabilities.description: Add a service to auto-fix monitoring

capabilities.name: render_remove_monitored_service
capabilities.description: Remove a service from auto-fix monitoring

capabilities.name: render_trigger_autofix
capabilities.description: Manually trigger auto-fix for a failed deploy

capabilities.name: jules_suggested_tasks
capabilities.description: Scan codebase for TODO/FIXME/HACK comments and suggest tasks for Jules

capabilities.name: jules_fix_suggested_task
capabilities.description: Create a Jules session to fix a suggested task
